p.k: Action adventure with Laura Linney. An expedition deep into central Africa encounters dangers that include a troop of intelligent killer apes
Tim Burton's fantasy drama stars Johnny Depp as a young man who, created but not completed by his inventor (Vincent Price), is left with shears for hands
Animated adventure. In the ogre's fourth feature-length escapade, Shrek makes an unwise bargain with Rumpelstiltskin. With the voices of Mike Myers
Last Holiday (2006) Comedy starring Queen Latifah. Diagnosed with a fatal illness, a US woman cashes in her life savings and takes a luxury European holiday
Family sci-fi adventure starring Ben Winchell. A 16-year-old is shocked to discover that he can emit increasingly powerful energy from his fingers
Action-comedy with Jesse Eisenberg and Kristen Stewart. A perpetually stoned slacker learns he's actually a deadly CIA sleeper agent
The Tarantino Connection: Horror with Brad Pitt. A retired UN investigator joins an armed research team that's searching for a cure to a virulent zombie plague. Gory violence
Gory horror. Friends stay in a remote cabin to help one of them (Jane Levy) kick her drug habit. But they accidentally unleash a demonic force
